p: Insect meal has stood out as an alternative ingredient to be included in animal feeds [ 4]. Insects are a natural food source for marine and freshwater fish species, including Nile tilapia [ 5, 6, 7]. In general, insects have high protein content, essential amino acids, lipids, minerals and vitamins [ 8, 9] and their nutritional composition may vary based on species, life stage and rearing conditions [ 8, 9].
